title: Soft: Scheduled Game Tile Design
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in
AND there are games scheduled for that day
custom_steps: WHEN the user views a scheduled game tile **without hovering over it**
custom_expected:
THEN the user should see the team match up with the teams logo & corresponding background team colors
AND the “@” symbol in place of Scores 
AND the scheduled  start time
AND Probable pitchers for each team

NOTE:
**Temp Status** & **Special Game alerts** are verified in separate test cases

title: Soft: Live Game Tile Design
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is logged in
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views a live game tile **without hovering over it
AND the user wants to see most up-to date information about a live game on .tv homepage
custom_expected:
THEN all of the following info on the game tile should be visible:
Match up teams and logos
Scores 
Game State and inning
Bases / Outs
Pitcher info, team and in-game stats
Hitter info, team and in-game stats
Special Alert tag (if available. Eg. Perfect game, No hitter)

Designs
https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

title: Hover over: Final Game Tile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN the user is logged in 
AND the game must have ended (plus 90 mins after ending)
custom_steps:
WHEN the user views a game tile for one that is completed and archived state
AND the user wants to see completed game details
custom_expected:
THEN populate the game tile with:

Match up teams, logos & Team background colors
Final Scores 
Final Game State and extra inning
WLS Player names
Grayed out bases/outs icons
Temp Status if available
Special Game alert if available

On Hover state, also populate
Team W/L record
Player stats
Player headshots
Feed links if available
Link to Highlights and recaps

When you click on the game tile, it should link to the archive for that game on another tab.

The data should be aligned as shown in the designs

Designs
Web Game tile anatomy - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5ecfc65f721ad446afbaab09/screen/5ef64b6a321bc12921bed983

CD - All game card states - https://app.zeplin.io/project/5eece94ce9c53d2aacfc60e6/screen/5ef1f022a852bb27fd5555cb
